Estimate gene-level dispersion (theta)

obtain_expression_information.Rd

Estimate gene-level dispersion (theta)

Usage

obtain_expression_information(
  response_matrix,
  TPM_thres = 0.1,
  rough = FALSE,
  n_threads = NULL
)

Arguments

response_matrix

CsparseMatrix (genes × cells).

TPM_thres

Numeric. Filter threshold on TPM. Default 1.

rough

Logical. If TRUE, use rough C++ estimator; otherwise use refined/MLE. Default FALSE.

n_threads

Integer controlling parallelism:

  • NULL – auto-detect (prefer NSLOTS, else local cores)

  • NA – force use of NSLOTS

  • positive integer – user-supplied core count

Value

response_id

Gene symbol passing the TPM filter

relative_expression

Proportion of total counts

expression_size

Estimated dispersion \(\theta\)

Examples

# Get response matrix from Cell Ranger output
cellranger_path <- system.file("extdata/cellranger_tiny", package = "perturbplan")
response_matrix <- obtain_qc_response_data(cellranger_path)
#> 'as(<ngTMatrix>, "dgTMatrix")' is deprecated.
#> Use 'as(., "dMatrix")' instead.
#> See help("Deprecated") and help("Matrix-deprecated").

# Extract expression information
expr_info <- obtain_expression_information(
  response_matrix = response_matrix,
  TPM_thres = 0.1,
  rough = TRUE
)
#> Start relative expression calculation @ 2025-10-01 12:25:13.941478
#> Finish relative expression calculation @ 2025-10-01 12:25:13.94211
#> Number of genes passing TPM threshold: 5
#> Start dispersion estimation (12 thread(s)) @ 2025-10-01 12:25:13.942312
#> [theta_batch_cpp] Starting computation
#>  - G (genes) = 5
#>  - C (cells) = 8
#> [gene 0] rel_expr = 0.0909091
#> [gene 0] t_0 = 0.0747664
#> [gene 0] theta_refined_row result = 0.220983
#> [gene 1] rel_expr = 0.363636
#> [gene 1] t_0 = 1.06889
#> [gene 1] theta_refined_row result = 251.069
#> [gene 2] rel_expr = 0.181818
#> [gene 2] t_0 = 0.272921
#> [gene 2] theta_refined_row result = 242.683
#> [gene 3] rel_expr = 0.181818
#> [gene 3] t_0 = 0.272921
#> [gene 3] theta_refined_row result = 242.683
#> [gene 4] rel_expr = 0.181818
#> [gene 4] t_0 = 0.272921
#> [gene 4] theta_refined_row result = 242.683
#> [theta_batch_cpp] Done.
#> Finish dispersion estimation @ 2025-10-01 12:25:13.943161

# Examine results
head(expr_info)
#>                     response_id relative_expression expression_size

#> ENSG00000238009 ENSG00000238009          0.36363636     251.0688935
#> ENSG00000239945 ENSG00000239945          0.18181818     242.6834302

dim(expr_info)
#> [1] 5 3
